#Text=Wikinews Shorts : February 27 , 2014
#Text=A compilation of brief news reports for
#Text=Thursday , February 27 , 2014
#Text=.
#Text=Asiana Airlines fined US$500K for not helping families after crash
#Text=Smoke billows from the wreckage after the crash last year .
#Text=Image : Jkhoo .
#Text=South Korea

#Text=-based Asiana Airlines was fined US$ 500,000 on Tuesday by the United States Department of Transportation for failing to provide support for victims ' families after Asiana Airlines Flight 214 crashed at San Francisco airport in July 2013 .
#Text=Foreign airlines are to abide by a federal law called the " family assistance plan " .

column1: #Text=The law states an airline must promptly assist and provide a toll-free number for calls from the passengers ' families .
#Text=It took the airline five days to contact the 291 families of the passengers aboard .
#Text=Of 307 on board , three Chinese teens died and over 200 people were injured .
#Text=The jet hit a seawall on approach , tearing the rear of the plane off , and throwing three flight attendants onto the runway .
#Text=Sources
#Text=Jeff Black . " U.S. Fines Asiana Airlines $500K for Not Helping Victims ' Families " â€” NBC News , February 25 , 2014
#Text=" Asiana Airlines penalized $500K for not assisting families after crash " â€” CBS News , February 25 , 2014
#Text=US prepares to withdrawal troops from Afghanistan
#Text=United States President Barack Obama has ordered the Pentagon to make plans to pull all the nation 's troops from Afghanistan by the end of 2014 .

#Text=The Obama administration notified Afghan president Hamid Karzai that it would prefer to keep a residual military presence in Afghanistan for training and counterterrorism missions , but Karzai is refusing to sign the agreement for some US forces to remain .
#Text=Once NATO ends hostilities in November , a contingency plan for a full departure will begin .
#Text=US-Afghan relations have worsened over the past few months .
#Text=Obama told Karzai the US will move forward with additional contingency planning if the bilateral agreement to maintain a US presence is not signed .
#Text=Sources
#Text=Karen DeYoung .
#Text=" Defense ministers say NATO is prepared to withdraw all troops from Afghanistan " â€” Washington Post , February 26 , 2014
#Text=Spencer Ackerman and Dan Roberts .
#Text=" Obama orders Pentagon to prepare for full troop withdrawal from Afghanistan " â€” The Guardian , February 26 , 2014
#Text=Killers of UK soldier sentenced
#Text=File : Drummer Lee Rigby - Cropped . jpg
#Text=Drummer Lee Rigby , from an official portrait .
#Text=Image : UK Ministry of Defence .
#Text=( Image missing from commons : image ; log )
#Text=After an attack in the London streets last year on British soldier Lee Rigby , two men were sentenced on Wednesday .
#Text=The leader of the attack , Michael Adebolajo , was sentenced to life behind bars .
#Text=Michael Adebowale was given a life sentence , but with the possibility of parole after serving a minimum of 45 years .
#Text=In court , the two Islamic converts indicated the killing was for Allah .
#Text=Bystanders watched Adebolajo and Adebowale hit Rigby with a car then butcher him with a meat cleaver and knives .
#Text=The attack was recorded on closed-circuit TV and by bystanders .
#Text=Both men were convicted of murder in December 2013 .
#Text=Sources
#Text=Laura Smith-Spark .
#Text=Claudia Rebaza and Jason Hanna .
#Text=" UK soldier 's killers sentenced " â€” CNN , February 26 , 2014
#Text=Henry Chu .
#Text=" Killers of British soldier in London sentenced , one to life in prison " â€” Los Angeles Times , February 26 , 2014
